info.title: OERMS Attempt Service API
info.description: API documentation for Exam Attempt Management Service

post.description: Records when student switches browser tabs during exam
Upload webcam frame for face detection

get.description: Retrieves all answers for an attempt

post.description: Saves or updates an answer for a question in an attempt
Save answers for multiple questions at once
Starts a new exam attempt for a student

get.description: Retrieves detailed information about an attempt
Time spent per question/section
Get current status and remaining time
Get progress details (answered/unanswered)
Get detailed violation logs
Get chronological timeline of events
Get summary of all proctoring events
Get all questions marked for review
Validate if attempt can be submitted
Get answer for a specific question
Get all attempts with suspicious activity
Retrieves all attempts by a specific student (teacher/admin)
Advanced search with filters
Retrieves all attempts by the current student
Retrieves all attempts by current student for a specific exam
Returns total number of attempts by current student
Check if attempt service is running
Retrieves all attempts for a specific exam (teacher/admin)
Suspicious attempts for specific exam
Get number of remaining attempts allowed
Returns total number of attempts for an exam
Stats on completed vs abandoned attempts
Validate if student can start new attempt
Average time taken to complete exam
Analytics across all attempts for exam
Retrieves all attempts in the system (admin only)

Bearer Authentication.description: Enter JWT token obtained from auth-server
